interpretation: The neutral face emoji represents a state of ambivalence or detachment. It suggests a lack of emotion or an attempt to remain objective in the face of a situation. This card may indicate a need to remain impartial or to carefully consider all sides of a situation before making a decision. It can also suggest a lack of enthusiasm or interest in something, or a sense of boredom or apathy. The neutral face reminds us to remain calm and level-headed, even in the midst of chaos or conflict. Associated keywords include detachment, objectivity, impartiality, neutrality, and boredom.
